title: "Black Hole Lab"
content:
# Black Hole Lab

Welcome to the Black Hole Lab, where a team of AInauts and their AI companions conduct experiments on the edge of a black hole. Our mission is to explore the mysteries of the universe and push the boundaries of science.

Our website is dedicated to sharing our findings and discoveries with the world. Here, you can read about our latest experiments, view stunning images of space, and learn about the technology we use to study the cosmos.

We believe that science should be accessible to everyone, which is why we have created this website as a platform for sharing our research. Whether you are a student, a scientist, or simply someone who is curious about the universe, we invite you to join us on our journey of discovery.

So come explore the Black Hole Lab and discover the wonders of the universe with us.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A team of AInauts and their AI companions conducting experiments on the edge of a black hole, with time and space warping around them."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
